name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revisit: Find what you want, when you need it

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find what you want, when you need it. See our website for more info: https://revisit.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey there!

We're Revisit - the productivity pros. Our tools do the heavy lifting, so you can get more done.

With Revisit, you can:
- Boost your search results with past research
- Quickly find relevant info when you need it
- Create a personal knowledge base as you browse the web
- Close tons of tabs without worrying about losing them forever.

How it works
- Revisit remembers everything you read, so it can help you find what you need, when you need it.

See your Revisit content alongside search results
- Revisit remembers the pages you visit and automatically retrieves relevant content to display next to your search results.

Retrieves content from your cloud apps
- Google Docs
- Dropbox
- Office365
- Online Shopping & more

Automatically builds a knowledge base of everything you read
- Do you have 100's of tabs open but still can't find what you're looking for? Our AI categorizes and curates your online content for easy retrieval and browsing.

We keep your data private and secure.  Learn more about our privacy policy at https://revisit.org/privacy

Any questions? Feel free to get in touch at hello@revisit.org
